WorkItem.Description: if you delete a number where the year is supposed to be after selecting a date the year can display 0209 instead of 2009.  I also noticed that validation is not done when the DisplayDateStart and DisplayDateEnd are set.  The date is still allowed to be set outside of this time frame.

Comments.Message:
For the first issue can you provide a repro and some step by step instructions along with what you expected ?

The displaydatestart and displaydateend do not affect the CurrentDate.  A user can select a date and then navigate to show other dates.  This is by design.
